name: AddProspectExperience
description:
Add a new work experience entry for a prospect.

This tool is used to add a new work experience to a prospect's record in Workday. It requires specifying essential details like company name, title, and start year. Use this to update candidate profiles with their professional history.

parameters.name: resource_workday_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID representing the prospect resource to add the work experience to.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: experience_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details like companyName, title, startYear for the prospect's work experience. Required fields must be included.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
